name: Rexus Victocora
items: stout cane (staff), noble outfit, Victocora signet ring, elixir of life (minor, 3)

passive.name: Aspiring Archivist
passive.description: May use <skill>Loremaster Lore</skill> in place of any other Lore skill, but only to Recall Knowledge.

offense.name: Arcane Spontaneous Spells
offense.description: DC 18, attack +8; 1st (four slots) ADMONISHING RAY, COLOR SPRAY, ILLUSORY DISGUISEBL, PUMMELING RUBBLE; Cantrips ACID SPLASH, DETECT MAGICBL, GALE BLAST, LIGHT, SHIELD

offense.name: Destined Blood Magic
offense.description: When Rexus casts his bloodline spell or any spell from his list of granted bloodline spells, he gains a destined aura that grants him a +1 status bonus to saving throws until the start of his next turn.

offense.name: :a: Widen Spell
offense.description: If the next action Rexus uses is to Cast a Spell that has an area of a cone and does not have a duration, add 5 feet to the length of the cone.
